summary: 2001 CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY TRANSMISSION WENT OUT AFTER 46000 MILES CAR COMES WITH A 3 YR 36000 WARRANTY. $2600. TO REPLACE CHRYSLER IS PUTTING THE TRANSMISSION DESIGNED FOR THE 2.2 / 4 CYLINDER VAN IN A 3.8 / 6 CYLINDER VERY POOR DESIGN. THE DEALER SAYS THAT THERE IS A NATION WIDE BACK ORDER ON THEIR TRANSMISSION. A CLASS ACTION SUITE NEEDS TO BE STARTED.     *NLM
